column3: Steps

column2: The “Sign Up Now” link is displayed on the Sign In page and navigates to the Sign Up page
column3: Navigate to the Sign In page
2. Observe result
Expected result:
The sign up link has text: “Sign Up Now”
3. Click on the “Sign Up Now” link
Expected result:
You are on the Sign Up page

column2: User can sign in with correct credentials
column3: Preconditions:
Credentials of existing user
Steps:
1. Input email to the email input
2. Input password to the password input
3. Click the “Sign In” button
Expected result:
The user is signed in

column2: The Sign In form has respective input placeholders
column3: 1. Navigate to the Sign In page
Expected result:
Email input has “Email” placeholder
Password input has “Password” placeholder

column2: Error text is displayed under respective input on the Sign In form
column3: 1. Navigate to the Sign In page
2. Click on the “Sign In” button
Expected result:
Email input error text is displayed under the email input field: “Please, enter your email address”
Password input error text is displayed under the password input field: “The Password is required”

column2: Error text is not displayed under respective input on the Sign In form once you fulfil the requirements of the respective field
column3: Preconditions:
Test case T0004
Steps:
1. Enter some password to the password input
Expected result:
Password input error text is not displayed
2. Enter a valid email to the email input
Expected result:
Email input error text is not displayed

column2: Respective input placeholders are shown once you enter some values to the Sign In form
column3: 1. Navigate to the Sign In page
2. Enter any value to the Email input
Expected result:
The “Email” placeholder is displayed for the email input
3. Enter any value to the password input
Expected result:
The “Password” placeholder is displayed for the password input

column2: User can sign up using email method
column3: Preconditions:
1. Navigate to the Sign In page
2. Click on the “Sign Up Now” button
Steps:
1. Enter correct first name to the First Name input
2. Enter correct last name to the Last Name input
3. Enter correct company name to the Company Name input
3. Select any Industry
4. Enter correct email to the Email input
5. Select desired country and enter some numbers to fulfil the phone format requirements (311111111 is enough for the +380 country) in the phone input
6. Enter a valid password to the password input
7. Click on the “Sign Up” button
Expected result:
User is created and logged in

column2: Alert is displayed when user is trying to log in with incorrect credentials
column3: 1. Navigate to the Sign In page
2. Enter credentials that does not exist
3. Click on the "Sign In” button
Expected result:
Alert message with “Invalid to login” text is displayed

column2: The “Sign In” link is displayed on the Sign Up page and navigates to the Sign In page
column3: Navigate to the Sign Up page
2. Observe result
Expected result:
The sign in link has text: “Sign In”
3. Click on the “Sign In” link
Expected result:
You are on the Sign In page

column2: Input placeholders are displayed for the Sign Up form
column3: 1. Navigate to the Sign Up page
2. Observe the result
Expected result:
First name input placeholder is “First Name”
Last name input placeholder is “Last Name”
Company name input placeholder is “Company Name”
Industry selector placeholder is “Industry”
Email input placeholder is “Email”
Phone input placeholder is “Phone”
Password input placeholder is “Password”

column2: Error messages for empty inputs on the Sign Up page
column3: 1. Navigate to the Sign Up page
2. Click on the Sign Up button
Expected result:
Error text under the first name input is “The First Name is required"
Error text under the last name input is “The Last Name is required"
Error text under the company name input is “The Company Name is required"
Error text under the industry selector is “Please, select the industry”
Error text under the email selector is “Please, enter your email address”
Error text under the phone input is “The Phone is required”
Error text under the password input is “The Password is required”

column2: Error messages for the “First Name” input on the Sign Up page
column3: 1. Navigate to the Sign Up page
2. Enter one character to the first name input
Expected result:
Error text under the first name input is “Min length for First Name is 2"
3. Enter two characters to the first name input
Expected result:
Error text under the first name input has disappeared

column2: Error messages for the “Last Name” input on the Sign Up page
column3: 1. Navigate to the Sign Up page
2. Enter one character to the last name input
Expected result:
Error text under the last name input is “Min length for Last Name is 2"
3. Enter two characters to the last name input
Expected result:
Error text under the last name input has disappeared

column2: Error messages for the “Company Name” input on the Sign Up page
column3: 1. Navigate to the Sign Up page
2. Click on the Sign Up button
Expected result:
Error text under the company name input is “The Company Name is required"
3. Enter one character to the company name input
Expected result:
Error text under the company name is not shown

column2: Error messages for the “Industry” selector on the Sign Up page
column3: 1. Navigate to the Sign Up page
2. Click on the Sign Up button
Expected result:
Error text under the industry selector is “Please, select the industry”
3. Select any industry
Expected result:
Error text under the industry selector has disappeared

column2: Error messages for the “Email” input on the Sign Up page
column3: 1. Navigate to the Sign Up page
2. Click on the Sign Up button
Expected result:
Error text under the email selector is “Please, enter your email address”
3. Enter an invalid email to the email input
Expected result:
Error text under the email selector is “Invalid email address”
4. Enter a valid email to the email field
Expected result:
Error text under the email input has disappeared

column2: Error messages for the “Phone” input on the Sign Up page
column3: 1. Navigate to the Sign Up page
2. Click on the Sign Up button
Expected result:
Error text under the phone input is “The Phone is required”
3. Enter 2-3 numbers to the phone input
Expected result:
Error text under the phone input is “Wrong number format"
4. Enter a valid phone to the phone input
Expected result:
Error text under the phone input has disappeared

column2: Error messages for the “Password” input on the Sign Up page
column3: 1. Navigate to the Sign Up page
2. Click on the Sign Up button
Expected result:
Error text under the password input is “The Password is required”
3. Enter a password shorter than 5 to the password field
Expected result:
Error text under the password input is “Min length for Password is 5”
4. Enter a password of length 5
Expected result:
Error text under the password input has disappeared
